Name: Zombocity
About the game: Imagine a beautiful day when you went out for a walk with your rollers and .... Zombiessssss!EVERYWHERE! Welcome to the Zombocity casual-survival game, where your childish talent for rolling can save you like never before. Your mission is to escape from these zombies. You must to avoid any contact with them, because if you just touch them, this will be you end. They are many, you are one. However, you have a very good chance of survival if you apply the correct movement technique. Due to the lack of a weapon, you have to rely only on your legs, that is, how fast you run. Do we start the spark in you and run away or let ourselves be caught? You decide! Game features: - Coins and Diamonds Shop - 11 different characters - Itemâ€™s upgrading
